<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_624695_librarym_issue_books</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_624695_librarym_issue_books">user_idISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="user_id" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Books Count</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	var myObj = new GlideRecord('x_624695_librarym_issue_books');
	myObj.addQuery('number','=',current.bookid.getDisplayValue());
	myObj.query();
	var obj = new GlideRecord('x_624695_librarym_user');
	obj.addQuery('userid','=',current.userid);
	obj.query();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-06-03 02:20:14</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>35d278c12f6c301055249dacf699b6ce</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Books Count</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Library Management" source="x_624695_librarym">0e57ea102f68301055249dacf699b6fb</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Library Management">0e57ea102f68301055249dacf699b6fb</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_35d278c12f6c301055249dacf699b6ce</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-04 06:21:36</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=35d278c12f6c301055249dacf699b6ce"/></record_update>
